name: FabFitFun, Inc.
description: Operator of a lifestyle membership platform intended to provide women with products from premium and emerging brands. The company's platform includes a curated collection of full-size products across beauty, fashion, wellness, fitness, home and technology and provides a streaming video service offering on-demand wellness videos and daily lifestyle content, an online community and year-round exclusive sales and shopping experiences, enabling women to lead healthier lifestyles.
